channel.title: Help getting rid of advertising on my server!
channel.description:
Hey, sometimes on my server ppls come and advertising their server. The problem is that it isnt only 1 guy. Its like 8 of them every time that spams with an autotalker. When i tryed to ipban them i couldt.. They didnt have any IP. Atleast i couldnt se it. Is it possible to make them just get auto ipbanned if they say something like "Join *****-Scape bjgvegjegvjegvhegjejgqjak today!" or anything?
Or it would be better if they just get muted for like 24 hrs or something :D

item.title: Help getting rid of advertising on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Dedeshede Dedeshede
item.description:
@Dedeshede wrote:

Kick them. Then IP ban them.

Read full topic
item.source: Help getting rid of advertising on my server!

item.title: Help getting rid of advertising on my server!
item.dc:creator: @Jaran Jaran
item.description:
@Jaran wrote:

Well i tryed… But none of them got banned. Nothing happend when i ipbanned them. And yes i know that the ipban work.

Read full topic
item.source: Help getting rid of advertising on my server!

item.title: Help getting rid of advertising on my server!
item.dc:creator: @GH_Addict GH_Addict
item.description:
@GH_Addict wrote:

just ipban / ipmute… everybody has an ip address

Read full topic
